Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Central
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Central, North Ave, Laramie & Grand, due to street blockage near Grand/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Central, North Ave, Laramie, then resume their normal route on Grand, due to street blockage near Grand/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Thorndale
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Thorndale due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Thorndale due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
